title: If I can't select free roto champs that I don't own in games...
body:
WHAT ABOUT THAT IS FREE?

Is there something I'm missing

replies.body: The "Free" Rotation isn't available in Ranked. It's Free to use and test in Normals, it is not to use in Ranked.
Not sure what you mean here.  Toss me some more details on the issue your experiencing, and I'll do my best to help!
